alert.note: Alert for Christian; Lawrence (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 5:29PM CDT until August 08 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Christian County in southwestern Missouri... Southeastern Lawrence County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 529 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Marionville, or 7 miles northeast of Aurora, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Aurora... Marionville... Billings... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
